EmailTemplate.name: Joiner Completion Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $!managerDisplayName,
The onboarding process for $!identityDisplayName has been successfully completed.
------------------------------------------------------------ Employee Details ------------------------------------------------------------ Employee ID : $!employeeId Name : $!firstName $!lastName Email : $!email Username (AD) : $!NS_samAccountName Temporary Password : $!password Is Rehire : $!isRehire ------------------------------------------------------------
#if($!managerFirstName) Please ensure that $!firstName receives the required onboarding guidance. #end
Thank you, Identity Management Team
EmailTemplate.Description: Email notification sent to manager when a new joiner account provisioning is completed.

Argument.name: managerDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the manager receiving the notification.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the onboarded employee.

Argument.name: email
Argument.Description: The email address of the onboarded employee.

Argument.name: isRehire
Argument.Description: Indicates if the employee is a rehire.

Argument.name: firstName
Argument.Description: First name of the onboarded employee.

Argument.name: lastName
Argument.Description: Last name of the onboarded employee.

Argument.name: employeeId
Argument.Description: Employee ID of the onboarded employee.

Argument.name: password
Argument.Description: Temporary password for the new account.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Joiner Completed: $!firstName $!lastName ($!employeeId)
